predicate.note: Frames file for 'rumble' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

roleset.name: to move or proceed with a long rolling sound

example.name: with direction
example.text: East Germany yesterday removed Erich Honecker , one of the staunchest holdouts against the reform rumbling through the Communist world , in an effort [*] to win back the confidence of its increasingly rebellious citizens .
